sections.heading: OF THE COMPETENCE OF WITNESSES AND OF CERTAIN DESIGNATIONS IN TESTAMENTSArt
sections.text: 1581. Persons incompetent to be witnessesA person cannot be a witness to any testament if the person is insane, blind, under the age of sixteen, or unable to sign his name.Acts 1997, No. 1421, ยง1, eff. July 1, 1999; Acts 20
